W: Whenever this creature attacks, flip a coin. If you win the flip, this creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
Whenever this creature blocks, flip a coin. If you win the flip, prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by this creature this combat.
Whenever you win a coin flip, you gain 2 life.
Whenever you lose a coin flip, you gain 1 life.
Whenever this creature or another creature you control wins a coin flip, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature.
At the beginning of combat on your turn, flip a coin. If you win the flip, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, flip a coin. If you win the flip, counter that spell or ability.
Whenever you win a coin flip, create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token.
Whenever you lose a coin flip, create a 0/1 white Wall creature token with defender.
Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, flip a coin. If you win the flip, you gain that much life.
Whenever you win a coin flip, you may tap up to one target creature an opponent controls.
Whenever you lose a coin flip, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.
At the beginning of your end step, flip a coin. If you win the flip, you may return up to one target creature card with mana value 2 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.
Whenever a creature you control dies, flip a coin. If you win the flip, return that creature to your hand.
Whenever you win one or more coin flips, creatures you control gain vigilance until end of turn.
Whenever an opponent wins a coin flip, you gain 2 life and scry 1.
Whenever this creature would die, you may flip a coin. If you win the flip, instead exile it, then return it to the battlefield under its owner’s control at the beginning of the next end step.
Whenever you win a coin flip, you may remove a +1/+1 counter from this creature. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on up to one other target creature.
Whenever you win a coin flip, put a shield counter on this creature.
Whenever this creature attacks, flip a coin. If you lose the flip, this creature gets +0/+3 until end of turn.
Whenever you win a coin flip, you may tap this creature. If you do, tap up to two target creatures an opponent controls.
Whenever an opponent loses a coin flip, you may gain control of target creature with mana value 2 or less until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains lifelink until end of turn.
Whenever this creature blocks, flip a coin. If you win the flip, remove this creature from combat and prevent all damage that would be dealt to it this turn.
Whenever you win a coin flip, put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two target creatures.
Whenever you lose a coin flip, you may sacrifice this creature. If you do, creatures you control gain indestructible until end of turn.
U: Whenever you flip a coin, scry 1.
Whenever you win a coin flip, draw a card, then discard a card.
Whenever you lose a coin flip, mill two cards.
Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, flip a coin. If you win the flip, draw a card.

Whenever you win a coin flip, untap up to one target permanent.
Whenever an opponent wins a coin flip, you may draw a card.
Whenever you lose a coin flip, you may have target creature you control phase out.
Whenever this creature becomes tapped, flip a coin. If you win the flip, it doesn’t tap. (It remains untapped.)
Whenever you win a coin flip, you may reveal the top card of your library. If it’s a nonland card, you may cast it this turn.
Whenever you lose a coin flip, put the top two cards of your library into your graveyard, then you may put a nonland card from your graveyard on top of your library.
At the beginning of combat on your turn, flip a coin. If you win the flip, up to one target creature can’t be blocked this turn.
Whenever you win a coin flip, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. Then if it has three or more +1/+1 counters on it, it gains flying.
Whenever you win a coin flip, target player mills three cards.
Whenever you lose a coin flip, you may return this creature to its owner’s hand.
Whenever you win one or more coin flips each turn, copy up to one target instant or sorcery spell you control. You may choose new targets for the copy.
Whenever you win a coin flip, you may tap or untap target artifact or creature.
Whenever this creature attacks, flip a coin. If you win the flip, it gains flying and hexproof until end of turn.
Whenever you lose a coin flip, you may pay {1}. If you do, draw a card.
Whenever an opponent flips a coin, you may flip a coin. If you win the flip, you may change the result of that coin flip.
Whenever you win a coin flip, put a stun counter on up to one target creature an opponent controls.
Whenever you win a coin flip, you may exile the top card of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play that card.
Whenever you lose a coin flip, put a -1/-0 counter on target creature an opponent controls.
Whenever you win a coin flip, this creature can’t be blocked this turn except by creatures with flying.
Whenever you win your second coin flip each turn, take an extra upkeep step after this phase.
B: Whenever you win a coin flip, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
Whenever you lose a coin flip, sacrifice another creature.
Whenever this creature attacks, flip a coin. If you win the flip, defending player loses 3 life and you gain 3 life.
Whenever a creature you control dies, flip a coin. If you win the flip, return that card to your hand.

Whenever you lose a coin flip, put a -1/-1 counter on target creature.

Whenever you lose a coin flip, exile the top card of your library face down. You may look at it any time.

Whenever this creature blocks or becomes blocked, flip a coin. If you win the flip, destroy target creature blocking or blocked by it.

Whenever you win a coin flip, this creature gains deathtouch until end of turn.
Whenever you lose a coin flip, you may sacrifice a creature. If you do, draw two cards and lose 2 life.

Whenever you win a coin flip, put a +1/+1 counter on each other creature you control that died this turn.
Whenever this creature dies, flip a coin. If you win the flip, return it to the battlefield tapped under your control.
Whenever you win exactly one coin flip during your turn, you may have each opponent lose 2 life.

Whenever you win a coin flip, this creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
Whenever you lose a coin flip, this creature deals 1 damage to you.
Whenever you cast a spell that instructs you to flip a coin, this creature deals 1 damage to any target.

Whenever you lose a coin flip, sacrifice a Goblin you control. If you can’t, this creature deals 2 damage to you.

Whenever an opponent wins a coin flip, this creature deals 1 damage to that player.
Whenever you win a coin flip, add {R}. Until end of turn, you don’t lose this mana as steps and phases end.
Whenever you lose a coin flip, discard a card, then draw a card.
Whenever this creature becomes blocked, flip a coin. If you win the flip, this creature gains double strike until end of turn.

Whenever you win a coin flip, target creature can’t block this turn.

Whenever you lose a coin flip, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature and remove a +1/+1 counter from another target creature you control.

Whenever you win a coin flip, double the number of +1/+1 counters on target creature you control.

Whenever you win a coin flip, you may have target creature you control fight up to one target creature you don’t control.
Whenever you lose a coin flip, sacrifice a land. If you do, draw a card.

Whenever you lose a coin flip, remove a counter from this creature.
